name: Super Carrot The Bouncy Hero
description:
- Description -

Enter one of the six levels, pick up a water can and go back to the beginning. Anything for your baby carrots who are almost dehydrated. Will you save them all or will you give up against the hostility of the homelike environment?

- Controls -

A and D - Horizontal movement

W - Jump

S - Roll

E - Go back to the menu

R - Restart the current level

- Credits -

Music and SFX by Joaquin Carcedo

Game by Gemarcx

Special thanks to Emparans

And thanks to all the Testers for the feedback!
